item.title: Implementing an heterogeneous dynamic array in C++
item.description: Introduction heterogeneous: consisting of dissimilar or diverse constituents dynamic array: a dynamic array is a random access, variable-size list data structure that allows elements to be added or removed. […] A simple dynamic array can be constructed by allocating an array of fixed-size, typically larger than the number of elements immediately required. The elements of the dynamic array are stored contiguously at the start of the underlying array, […]
